title: The Prose Works of Sir Walter Scott. (Supplementary volume: containing notes, historical and illustrative, by the author, glossary, etc.)
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: The individual gipsy upon whom the character ofMeg Merrilies was founded, was well known aboutthe middle of the last century, by the name of JeanGordon, an inhabitant ofthe village of Kirk Yetholm,in the Cheviot hills, adjoining to the English Border.

title: Travels in Scotland: translated from the German. With notes by the translator [John Kesson]
author: Kohl, Johann Georg.
snippet: The largest colony of Scottish gipsies lives in one of its villages, called Kirk Yetholm.
